snippet.title: Bloodless - Official Demo Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description:
Take a look at the stylish world of Bloodless in this new trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game. Bloodless will be available on PC on August 29, 2024, and a demo is coming to Steam on June 10.

Bloodless features aggressive, non-lethal combat centered around ronin Tomoe's signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.
